description: Ariel X "The Assassin", destroys the upstart Smokie Flame "The Phoenix". The Assassin takes control early and often, fingering her helpless opponent at will. The Phoenix puts up a valiant fight and never gives up, but the Assassin is relentless. The Assassin gets 5 submissions, scoring numerous face sits, followed by finger fucking her opponent to yet another win. The Assassin is undefeated this season, and the Phoenix is brutally fucked again in RD4.
title: Ariel X "The Assassin" (4-2)
